short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic new tab page, featuring a simplistic clock and your favorite Unsplash image as background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simplistic and clean looking new tab page that makes opening new tabs a beautiful and smooth experience.

Features:
- Clock showing the current time
- Background image freely choosable (any Unsplash image you want)
